to the website


Services: Website Design | Website Development Supervision | Photography & Video


Client: Nucleix LTD – Innovative non-invasive molecular cancer diagnostics tests


The Challenge: To manifest the innovative Spirit of the Company in every touch-point with their users.


Nucleix Ltd. develops, manufactures and markets innovative non-invasive molecular cancer diagnostic tests. Liquid biopsies are a new powerful tool in cancer diagnostics that are transforming patient healthcare. Body fluids such as blood or urine are obtained from the patient and analyzed for the presence of circulating tumor DNA which is shed from the cancer. 


Creative Director - Sagi Rechter

Artist - Emma Lindström

Lead Designer - Einav Blum

Developer - Elad Feinberg

Photographer - Assaf Ambram
